name: If I am all alone, do i still exist?
name_original: If I am all alone, do i still exist?
description:
This was a very hard project for me but I prevailed. It is unfortunate that I wasn't able to do more. I learned a lot of things and did a game on Unity on my first time!

I learned about singletons, game manager, animation, scripting and creating animations, animating via code. Managed to learn a lot of great hings about Blender too.

I will come back to it a bit later since I would like to tell a story with this game.

The theme "A lot" is implemented by the player having to go through multiple "dimensions".

Heavily inspired by  adventure games like Penumbra, The Backrooms and the Silent Hill series. Solve the riddles and find your way out of this strange place you are stuck.

How to Play:

WASD Controls
Space to jump
F to Interact with Objects

Credits

Road Texture on Chapter 2 by Jordan Holbrook
Rock Ground Texture used in the artifact area in Chapter 1 by InflationFree on Renderhub
Rusty Texture used in the Lampposts in Chapter 2 by Nudelkopf on Renderhub

Tools Used
Blender
Texture Lab
Reaper
Audacity
Gimp
Unity Engine

Added Windows and Linux Versions! I will upload a guide of how to tomorrow because I had to deal with errors. It would be very helpful if you try to run the games in Windows and Linux. If there are any issues, please send me an email : therunner2022@outlook.com or write a comment.
